item.description:
YALE vs Harvard

What it is: One of college football's most famous rivalries.

When it is: Saturday November 21st at noon

What we do: Tailgate and cheer for the Bulldogs

For those who love football, or for those who just enjoy spending a fall day outdoors. Known throughout the country as “The Game,” it should be quite a day with thousands of students, alumni, and fans coming together at the historic Yale Bowl for an afternoon of football fun. We will be joining the New Haven Collective group who already have about 20 people attending.

Game starts at Noon, Tailgate starts at 9:30
Please plan on bringing something to share.

Tickets are $7.00 for General Admission


Parking Passes are sold out!!!! If you do not have a parking pass yet you will need to carpool in or take the shuttle.
http://www.yalebulldo...
We will be in lot H
Look for the Yellow and Purple Balloons

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: The Game - Yale vs. Harvard Let's Tailgate
